metadata.name: Due Tiri
metadata.description:
The first track ever by the Italian rapper Kioppa Rebel to be minted on the Ethereum blockchain.

The First Exclusive Limited Edition for the owners of KIOPPA REBEL COLLECTOR PASS 

GET YOUR PASS HERE: https://opensea.io/collection/kiopparebelcollectorpass

The track is DUE TIRI from the last EP of Kioppa Rebel FIGLIO DI QUESTE STRADE produced by Ayy Yo Felix! 
https://kiopparbl.bandcamp.com/album/figlio-di-queste-strade

The artwork is a beautiful loop by the italian artist Mamo Banton 

ARTIST PROFILE : https://instagram.com/mamobanton 

Every Limited Edition give access to AL or can be BURNED for a Phygital Edition NFT which will give you free merch ,cds and vynils
